data.name: AttachDisk_AzureClient_Description
data.value: The client used to connect to Azure

data.name: AttachDisk_Container_Description
data.value: The container that holds the VHD file

data.name: AttachDisk_Description
data.value: Attaches an existing disk to the virtual machine with the specified name and resource group

data.name: AttachDisk_DiskName_Description
data.value: The name of the disk to attach

data.name: AttachDisk_DiskResourceGroup_Description
data.value: The resource group of the disk

data.name: AttachDisk_IsManagedDisk_Description
data.value: Specify whether the disk to attach is managed

data.name: AttachDisk_ResourceGroup_Description
data.value: The resource group of the VM

data.name: AttachDisk_StorageAccount_Description
data.value: The storage account where VHD file is located

data.name: AttachDisk_VhdName_Description
data.value: The name of the VHD file

data.name: AttachDisk_VirtualMachineName_Description
data.value: The VM where the disk will be attached

data.name: AttachManagedDisk_Description
data.value: Attaches a managed data disk to the virtual machine with the specified name and resource group

data.name: AttachManagedDisk_Summary
data.value: Attach managed disk <DISKNAME> to VM <VIRTUALMACHINENAME> of resource group <RESOURCEGROUP>

data.name: AttachUnManagedDisk_Description
data.value: Attaches an unmanaged disk to the VM with the specified name and resource group

data.name: AttachUnManagedDisk_Summary
data.value: Attach VHD <VHDNAME> to VM <VIRTUALMACHINENAME> of resource group <RESOURCEGROUP> as data disk

data.name: Azure_Description
data.value: Connect to Azure Cloud and automate the management of resources like virtual machines, disks, snapshots and resource groups

data.name: AzureManagedVmDisk_FriendlyName
data.value: Azure managed disk attached to VM

data.name: AzureManagedVmDisk_FriendlyNamePlural
data.value: Azure managed disks attached to VM

data.name: AzureUnManagedVmDisk_FriendlyName
data.value: Azure unmanaged disk attached to VM

data.name: AzureUnManagedVmDisk_FriendlyNamePlural
data.value: Azure unmanaged disks attached to VM

data.name: Category_ResourceGroups_Description
data.value: Connect to Azure Cloud and manage resource groups

data.name: Category_VirtualMachines_Description
data.value: Connect to Azure Cloud and manage virtual machines, disks and snapshots

data.name: Category_VirtualMachines_Disks_Description
data.value: Connect to Azure Cloud and manage disks

data.name: Category_VirtualMachines_Snapshots_Description
data.value: Connect to Azure Cloud and manage snapshots

data.name: CreateManagedDiskAction_AvailabilityZone_Description
data.value: The availability zone for the managed disk

data.name: CreateManagedDiskAction_AzureClient_Description
data.value: The client used to connect to Azure

data.name: CreateManagedDiskAction_Description
data.value: Creates a managed disk with the specified settings

data.name: CreateManagedDiskAction_DiskName_Description
data.value: The name of the managed disk to create

data.name: CreateManagedDiskAction_Location_Description
data.value: The location where the new disk is created

data.name: CreateManagedDiskAction_ResourceGroup_Description
data.value: The resource group of the disk

data.name: CreateManagedDiskAction_ResourceGroupCreateOption_Description
data.value: Specify whether a new resource group will be created or an existing one will be used

data.name: CreateManagedDiskAction_SizeInGb_Description
data.value: Size of the disk in GB

data.name: CreateManagedDiskAction_SnapshotName_Description
data.value: The managed snapshot to use as a source

data.name: CreateManagedDiskAction_SnapshotResourceGroup_Description
data.value: The resource group of the snapshot

data.name: CreateManagedDiskAction_Source_Description
data.value: Specifies whether to create an empty disk or use the snapshot of another disk or use a blob in a storage account

data.name: CreateManagedDiskFromStorageBlob_Description
data.value: Creates a managed disk from storage blob

data.name: CreateManagedDiskFromStorageBlob_Summary
data.value: Create managed disk <DISKNAME> from storage blob <BLOBURL>

data.name: CreateResourceGroup_AzureClient_Description
data.value: The client used to connect to Azure

data.name: CreateResourceGroup_GroupName_Description
data.value: The name of the resource group

data.name: CreateResourceGroup_Location_Description
data.value: The location where the new disk will be created

data.name: CreateResourceGroup_Summary
data.value: <if(RESOURCEGROUP)> Create a new resource group and store it into <RESOURCEGROUP><else> Create a new resource group<endif>

data.name: CreateSessionAction_AuthFile_Description
data.value: The path of the file with all the required information to authenticate

data.name: CreateSessionAction_ClientId_Description
data.value: The client Id of the application, also known as application Id, which identifies the application that is using the token

data.name: CreateSessionAction_ClientSecret_Description
data.value: The secret for the client ID

data.name: CreateSessionAction_SubscriptionId_Description
data.value: The Azure subscription ID. If not provided, the default subscription will be used

data.name: CreateSessionAction_TenantId_Description
data.value: The directory ID of the Azure Active Directory

data.name: CreateSessionViaFile_Description
data.value: Creates an Azure session using an authentication file

data.name: CreateSessionViaFile_Summary
data.value: <if(AZURECLIENT)> Create an Azure session using authentication file <AUTHFILE> and store the result in <AZURECLIENT><else> Create an Azure session using authentication file <AUTHFILE><endif>

data.name: CreateSessionViaServicePrincipal_Description
data.value: Creates an Azure session using service principal

data.name: CreateSessionViaServicePrincipal_Summary
data.value: <if(AZURECLIENT)> Create an Azure session with service principal and store the result in <AZURECLIENT><else> Create an Azure session with service principal<endif>

data.name: CreateSnapshot_AzureClient_Description
data.value: The client used to connect to Azure

data.name: CreateSnapshot_Description
data.value: Creates a snapshot from the specified disk

data.name: CreateSnapshot_DiskName_Description
data.value: The name of the managed disk that will be used as source data

data.name: CreateSnapshot_DiskResourceGroup_Description
data.value: The resource group of the managed disk that will be used as source data

data.name: CreateSnapshot_Location_Description
data.value: The location where the new disk will be created

data.name: CreateSnapshot_ResourceGroup_Description
data.value: The resource group where the snapshot will be created

data.name: CreateSnapshot_ResourceGroupCreateOption_Description
data.value: Specifies whether a new resource group will be created or an existing one will be used

data.name: CreateSnapshot_SnapshotName_Description
data.value: The name of the snapshot to create

data.name: CreateSnapshot_Summary
data.value: <if(SNAPSHOT)> Create snapshot <SNAPSHOTNAME> from disk <DISKNAME> and store it into <SNAPSHOT><else> Create snapshot <SNAPSHOTNAME> from disk <DISKNAME><endif>

data.value: The resource group of the VM

data.value: Detach disk <DISKNAME> from virtual machine <VIRTUALMACHINENAME> of resource group <RESOURCEGROUP>

data.value: End the Azure session stored in <AZURECLIENT>

data.name: Error_AttachedToVirtualMachineError_Description
data.value: Indicates a problem deleting the disk because it is attached to a VM

data.value: Failed to delete the disk because it is attached to a VM

data.value: Indicates that the Azure client isn't initialized and can't be used

data.name: Error_AzureClientNotInitializedError_FriendlyName
data.value: Failed to use Azure client since it isn't initialized

data.name: Error_DiskNotFoundError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the disk with the specified criteria doesn't exist

data.name: Error_FailedToAttachDiskError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the disk attachment failed

data.value: Indicates that creating the Azure client failed

data.name: Error_FailedToDeleteDiskError_Description

data.name: Error_FailedToDeleteSnapshotError_Description
data.value: Indicates that deleting the snapshot failed

data.name: Error_FailedToDescribeVirtualMachinesError_FriendlyName
data.value: Failed to get basic information of the VM(s)

data.name: Error_FailedToDetachDiskError_Description
data.value: Indicates that detaching the disk failed

data.value: Indicates that an error occurred while trying to stop the VM

data.value: Indicates that the attachment failed because both unmanaged and managed disk can't exist together in a VM

data.value: Both unmanaged and managed disk can't exist together in a VM

data.name: Error_NotAttachedToVirtualMachineError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the detachment failed because the disk isn't attached to the specified VM

data.value: Failed to detach because the disk isn't attached to the specified VM

data.value: Indicates that the resource group already exists and can't be created

data.name: ErrrorMessage_NotInitializedAzureClient
data.value: The Azure client hasn't been initialized.

data.name: ErrorMessage_VirtualMachineNotFoundInResourceGroup
data.value: Virtual machine '{0}' wasn't found in resource group '{1}'.

data.name: ErrorMessage_DiskNotFoundInResourceGroup
data.value: Disk '{0}' wasn't found in resource group '{1}'.

data.name: ErrorMessage_ManagedDiskNotEnabled
data.value: Virtual machine '{0}' doesn't have managed disk enabled. Both un-managed and managed disks can't exist together in a virtual machine.

data.name: ErrorMessage_ManagedDiskEnabled
data.value: Virtual machine '{0}' has managed disk enabled. Both un-managed and managed disks can't exist together in a virtual machine.

data.name: ErrorMessage_DiskAlreadyExists
data.value: Disk '{0}' already exists in resource group '{1}'.

data.name: ErrorMessage_SnapshotNotFoundInResourceGroup
data.value: Snapshot '{0}' wasn't found in resource group '{1}'.

data.name: ErrorMessage_DiskCantBeDeleted
data.value: Disk '{0}' is attached to virtual machine and can't be deleted.

data.name: ErrorMessage_DiskNotAttachedToVirtualMachine
data.value: Disk '{0}' isn't attached to virtual machine '{1}'.

data.name: ErrorMessage_SnapshotAlreadyExistsInResourceGroup
data.value: Snapshot '{0}' already exists in resource group '{1}'.

data.name: Message_AzureManagedDisk
data.value: Name: '{0}', Resource group: '{1}', Location: '{2}', State: '{3}', Configuration: '{4}', Is attached to virtual machine: '{5}', Tags: '{6}'

data.name: Message_AzureUnManagedVmDisk
data.value: Name: '{0}', Size: '{1} GiB', Vhd uri: '{2}', Caching: '{3}', Lun: '{4}'

data.name: Message_AzureVirtualMachineInfo
data.value: Name: '{0}', Status: '{1}', Resource group: '{2}', Location: '{3}', Operating system: '{4}', Tags: '{5}'

data.name: Message_AzureVirtualMachineAddedInfo
data.value: , Is managed disk enabled: '{0}', Managed data disks count: '{1}', Unmanaged data disks count: '{2}'

data.name: CreateManagedDiskAction_StorageAccountName_Description
data.value: The name of the storage account where VHD file is stored

data.name: Message_AzureSnapshot
data.value: Name: '{0}', Resource group: '{1}', Location: '{2}', Size: '{3} GiB', Tags: '{4}'
